scripts.browserify: mkdir -p js && browserify --debug app/main.js -o js/app.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2017 ] --plugins [ transform-es2015-modules-commonjs  transform-react-jsx ] ]
scripts.watchify: mkdir -p js && watchify app/main.js  -o js/app.js --debug -v -t [ babelify --presets [ es2017 ] --plugins [ transform-es2015-modules-commonjs  transform-react-jsx ] ]
scripts.dev: # this will most likely not work on window
scripts.build: # this will most likely not work on window
